data.title: Divine Star Libraries
data.description: A collection of various useful public libraries that I use for my work.
data.banner: { "src" : "/images/portfolio/apps/DivineStarLibraries/banner.jpg", "alt":"A 3d rendering of many cubes like Minecraft." }

pageProps.content:
#### Libraries

All libraries are currently part of the Divine Voxel Engine Mono Repo which can found at:[Divine Voxel Engine Repo](https://github.com/Divine-Star-Software/DivineVoxelEngine)


##### @divinestar/audio
[Link On NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@divinestar/audio)

A audio library designed for games written in TypeScript.

##### @divinestar/binary
[Link On NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@divinestar/binary)

This library has two features. First is binrary tagged buffers. Second is converting objects to binary and binary back to objects.
I use this a lot for my games and it is one of the core libraries of Divine Voxel Engine. 

##### @divinestar/controls
[Link On NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@divinestar/controls)

A library for handling controls for games written in TypeScript. 
It handles GamePads and keybaord/mouse controls. 

##### @divinestar/rng
[Link On NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@divinestar/rng)

A collection of random noise functions, seeded rngs, and other toosl for randomness such as weighted random. 

##### @divinestar/shaders
[Link On NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@divinestar/shaders)

A simple library to help compile shaders at runtime.  

##### @divinestar/threads
[Link On NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@divinestar/threads)

A library to handle multi threading in JavaScript. 

##### @divinestar/indexDB
[Link On NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@divinestar/indexDB)

A library to handle multi threaded use of indexDB.
